statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-17 \, x^{3} - 23 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 15 , 5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5 , -16 \, x^{3} - 14 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x - 1 , x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 2 , -x^{2} - 5 \, x - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
